nodes.text: Bernilla was a planet located in the Inner Rim region. It shared its name with Bernillan silk. Bernilla was depicted on a map included in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by historian and author Eloc Throno.
Bernilla was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
